__e: THEY DON'T KNOW IT'S THE PLAGUE.
I've just had a look at young lass and it's not the pestilence.
We don't know who's human, who's demon and who's Pestilence.
He's like a plague that's spreading from village to village.
But I am a bit upset, because of the many rumours about the plague, which are going around.
It wasn't the war they started. It wasn't the plague they created. It was Judgment.
"Those in the country shall die by the sword, "those in the city will be devoured by famine and plague.
He had power over a quarter of the earth to kill with his sword, with famine, with plague, and with the wild beasts of the earth!
- All we need is Pestilence and Death.
